info.author: Vladimir Kraus
info.description:
# dynobject
Dynamic object class which allows dynamic adding of attributes on the run
and dict-like access to the attributes.

```python
>>> d = DynObject()
>>> d.x = 10  # dynamic adding of attributes
>>> d.x  # access to attributes
10
>>> d["x"]  # access to attribute like to a dict
10
```
info.name: dynobject
info.summary: DynObject class which allows dynamic adding of attributes on the run and dict-like access to the attributes.
info.html_description:
# dynobject Dynamic object class which allows dynamic adding of attributes on the run and dict-like access to the attributes.

`python >>> d = DynObject() >>> d.x = 10  # dynamic adding of attributes >>> d.x  # access to attributes 10 >>> d["x"]  # access to attribute like to a dict 10 `
